tool_description: Highly available **unofficial tiktok mobile**  API. We are doing our best for make your life easy. Bigger API plans and additional functionality are available on request.
name: TokApi - mobile version
title: TokApi - mobile version

api_list.name: /v1/search/music

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: **Alpha-2** country code

optional_parameters.name: sort_type
optional_parameters.description: Sort type, can be empty or one of: `0` - Relevance, `1` - Most used, `2` - Most recent, `3` - Shortest, `4` - Longest

optional_parameters.name: filter_by
optional_parameters.description: Filter by type, can be empty or one of: `0` - All, `1` - Title, `2` - Creators

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: If in a response you get parameter hasMore equal to 1 then you also have cursor value for a next set

api_list.name: /v1/live/event/{event_id}
api_list.description: Get live event info by ID

required_parameters.name: event_id
required_parameters.description: Live event ID, can be obtained from user info

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tokapi-mobile-version.p.rapidapi.com/v1/live/event/7295967245652459563"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tokapi-mobile-version.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://tokapi-mobile-version.p.rapidapi.com/v1/live/event/{event_id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tokapi-mobile-version.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: /v1/search/post

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description: **Alpha-2** country code

optional_parameters.name: publish_time
optional_parameters.description: Date posted filter, can be empty or one of: `0` - All time, `1` - Yesterday, `7` - This week, `30` - This month, `90` - Last 3 months, `180` - Last 6 months

optional_parameters.name: sort_type
optional_parameters.description: Sort type, can be empty or one of: `3` - Date posted, `1` - Most liked, `0` - Relevance

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: If in a response you get parameter hasMore equal to 1 then you also have cursor value for a next set

optional_parameters.name: main_tab_id
optional_parameters.description: You can get **'main\\_tab\\_id'** from **'data.main\\_tab\\_list[].main\\_tab\\_id'**

optional_parameters.name: region

optional_parameters.name: tab_id
optional_parameters.description: You can get **'tab\_id'** from **'/v1/shop/products/{user\_id}/tab_list'** response

api_list.name: /v1/shop/search

optional_parameters.name: filters_data
optional_parameters.description:
All available filters can be found under **\"filter\\_groups\"** field from **response**.
The **\"filters\\_data\"** value must be JSON array in format: [{simple filter button},{range/multiple select}, and more filters].

Example for **{simple filter button}** - {\"type\": 2, \"value\": \"true\"}.
Example for **{range/multiple select}** - {\"type\":8, \"value\\_list\": [\"1,1000\"]}.

Full example with filter by **\"price\"** and **\"4 Stars & Up\"**: [{\"type\": 2, \"value\": \"true\"},{\"type\":8, \"value\\_list\": [\"1,1000\"]}]

optional_parameters.name: sort_by
optional_parameters.description: Sort types, possible values: **PRICE\\_ASC**, **PRICE\\_DESC**, **BEST\\_SELLERS**, **RELEVANCE**

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: If in a response you get parameter **has\\_more** equal to 1 then you also have **cursor** value for a next set

api_list.name: /v1/user/{user_id}/followings

required_parameters.name: user_id
required_parameters.description: user's ID can be uid or sec_uid

optional_parameters.name: ids_only
optional_parameters.description: If 1 will return only followings IDs, otherwise will return full information

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: If in a response you get parameter has_more equal to 1 then you also have min_time value for a next request

api_list.name: /v1/search/user

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: If in a response you get parameter hasMore equal to 1 then you also have cursor value for a next set

optional_parameters.name: other_pref
optional_parameters.description: Filter by other preference, can be empty or one of: `USERNAME` (keyword usage in username)

optional_parameters.name: profile_type
optional_parameters.description: Filter by user profile type, can be empty or `VERIFIED`

optional_parameters.name: follower_count
optional_parameters.description: Filter by followers count, can be empty or one of: `ZERO_TO_ONE_K`(0 to 1k), `ONE_K_TO_TEN_K`(1k to 10k), `TEN_K_TO_ONE_H_K`(10k to 100k), `ONE_H_K_PLUS`(100k+)

optional_parameters.description: The type of loading feed (0 - Initial loading, 2 - Load more, 8 - Reload)
